subject: Ordrr SSN4475
description_text:
Hi, i recently recieved an order from you, still waiting on the new gearbox to ship, i noticed i bought the wrong pedals, i wanted the new plus x hydraulic, i ordered the regular, so i need this added to my order.
2 two way hydraulic rod
1 one way hydraulic rod
1 set of white elastomer 30kg
Is it  possible for you to make a gesture ? The pedals i wanted were only 5€ more expensive, this is 43€ more expensive, and could you add this to my order when you ship the gearbox ? Thank you.

Envoyé à partir de Outlook pour Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>

conversations.body_text: Hi Rémy Tupin,  I’m not entirely sure I understand. You ordered the Plus X pedals, and you should have received the Plus X pedals, correct? Please take a photo of all three pedals and indicate which ones are not as expected.

Hi, i ordered the plus x and got the plus x, but i see you have a different version with hydraulic, maybe im wrong, but i see two different version, see atrached pictures.


Envoyé à partir de Outlook pour Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________
Hi Rémy Tupin,    These two links are for the same product, so no need to worry.

Hi, ok ? can you add the white elastomer to my order when you send the new gearbox please ? I will pay for it

Envoyé à partir de Outlook pour Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________
Hi Rémy Tupin,    Alright, you can click the link to make the payment. I've already added the white elastomer for you. https://www.simsonn.com/products/difference-2

Perfect thanks

Envoyé à partir de Outlook pour Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________

Hi, any idea when the gearbox and the elastomers will be shipped out ? Website says it starts shipping on the 19 december, thanks

Envoyé à partir de Outlook pour Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________
Hi Rémy Tupin,    I apologize for the delayed response. Here is your tracking link.   https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047209490339         Happy New Year!

Hi thanks, happy new year

Envoyé à partir de Outlook pour Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
